content: 🐰 bunny peepz mc magic_ring yarn bernat baby single_crochet single_crochet blanket super bulky half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hook size 6 4 25m slp st slip_stitch chain chain 2 halfs 8oz yarn st sts stitch/es + stuffing = 1 0oz round in the round row short row + turn work repeat repeat pattern for 2 halves to get 1 peep head+body round 1 mc single_crochet 6 chain 2 6sts rnd2 2 single_crochet each st chain 2 12sts row 1 2 single_crochet in the next 3 sts chain 2 6sts row 2 5 single_crochet chain 2 and turn for 7 row 6sts border+ears row 1 chain 1 2 single_crochet into corner st side of bunny 5 single_crochet slp st into row 8 neck 8sts single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 1 side of head 12sts chain 7 single_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in the next 4 chs single_crochet in the next chain then slp st in the middle st of the head single_crochet 1 then repeat for second ear slp st into the st at the bottom of ear single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 in the next st single_crochet 1 slp st in neck row single_crochet next 5 sts single_crochet 2 into corner st single_crochet 5 then slp st into start of border leaving a long tail 19sts embroider face details and sew two half s together with stuffing enjoy peeps c
